## insertTabs() function

inserts tabs in front of every line in s

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function insertTabs(string: string, count?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  string | <code>string</code> | the string to insert tabs in front of |
|  count | <code>number</code> | whole number of tabs to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
